attributes.action: Apologise to Mr Green unreservedly for the actions taken against the aforementioned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ...apologise to Damian Green unreservedly for the actions taken by the Home Office over the "leak" affair. This is based on the Prime Minister's own actions when in 1985 he was an up-and-coming opposition MP doing exactly the same thing "in the national interest". As seen in his interview with Frank Bough at the time and freely available on YouTube for public consumption

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
